fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Feed a target false information. For two nights, they will receive incorrect results from their investigative abilities (the results are randomly chosen to be anything that isn't true. Example: if a Lookout just saw Player 3 visit Player 1, they would receive any kind of result other than that, like Player 1 wasn't visited, or Player 2 visited Player 1 instead). (The results must be feasible.) Your ability fails if you donâ€™t target an investigative role. You can only use this ability twice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Manipulator and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
A Manipulator fed you false information! You will receive incorrect results for two nights.
Your results are back to normal. (After two nights)
